msbt.message: Sometimes, going for a walk helps me clear my head and refocus.Just now, I was composing a poem to send my mom on her birthday
I've been walking around with this same song stuck in my head since yesterday. It's awful, ! Wait It's gone! Seeing you must have broken the curse. I'm free!
Experience is a great teacher I feel like I learn something new every time I go out for a walk. Just now, I discovered that it makes me happy to run into you!
I don't want to miss even the smallest changes to our island, so let me know if any happen!
The air's so great out here! I'm really glad I left the house to breathe it in, .

I like to keep the area around my home cleared of weeds or fallen fruit. I just need it to look nice. I want to give a good impression before visitors even come inside.Also, what if my parents dropped by?
Have you ever been inside 's home?Doesn't decorating style just seem so "?"Like, you'd know who lived there even if hadn't invited you in.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />So this is your tent, huh?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I like it Rustic, with that close-to-nature feel.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your home is so cozy! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />There's a lot of appeal in smaller spaces Less to clean, motivation to avoid clutter Pretty clever, if you ask me!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Must be nice to have extra space.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You can really spread out in here and make yourself comfortable!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />So, you have an extra room here? Must be nice, having more options for decorating and furnishing <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Now you've got me wondering if I should add on an extra room of my own. A hobby space, maybe? So much potential,

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your home is so great, and I love that you have those extra rooms!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />With more rooms, I could set aside space just for my cooking or crafts I'd love some special-purpose rooms.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />It's so interesting to see what different choices folks make when they lay out their homes. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />What do you see when you walk in the front door? How are you drawn through a space, into other rooms? I've always thought home design was super interesting, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your home is so spacious, !<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />You almost have too many options for furnishing and decorating, with this much space. Must be nice!
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your house has a basement too?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />They say you can never have too much storage. I'm sooo envious!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Maybe right now is living in a tent, butDon't you think they'll get around to building a house eventually?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />And if they do, what kind of place might they build? I guess I just like dreaming up home designs
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I was just noticing the color of 's roof<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I think it's a bold and eye-catching look against the local scenery.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />'s house seems like a perfect, manageable size.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />That's assuming they don't need room for a bunch of new belongings. I never seem to have enough space

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You know, I really think the size of 's home is ideal.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I hope they don't catch me staring and admiring it. I don't want to seem rude or anything, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />'s home would be more than big enough for me, but<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Knowing them, they're probably already planning to add onto it and expand.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />'s home has so many different rooms!<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'd love to help them decorate and furnish it, but I'm not really an expert or anything. I just like home design.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />'s house is huge, isn't it?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />A house as big as theirs would be a blast to decorate and furnish!

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />'s home is just sobig, isn't it? I know they must have worked hard to earn such a huge house, but I just <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />can't help being a bit envious.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Did you know that Timmy and Tommy are living in the Resident Services tent for now, with Tom Nook?<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Since it's where they're living, that's probably why it feels so cozy inside.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Nook's Cranny is still small enough that it's easy to find whatever I'm looking for, . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I'm worried I'll get overwhelmed if the store keeps expanding.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I'm always at Nook's Cranny, even though I don't generally like to go shopping all that much. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I appreciate having a place to shop that's so convenient and laid back.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I heard Blathers is going to research local creatures and fossils in his tent. I'd love to do that kind of work! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />If all his research leads up to a real museum getting built, I can't wait to tour the exhibits, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Our Resident Services works hard in the background to keep our island running smoothly, . <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I think I might go drop off , to thank them for all they do for us.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I love watching airplanes take off over water.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />It's a marvel that we can ride in an airplane and arrive at a different island in no time at all, .
The plaza can be a really good place to catch up with other islanders.Sometimes I walk through it just to see who I run into, .
Don't you think the plaza makes our island seem more cosmopolitan?I feel chic just reading or chatting with a neighbor if I'm in the plaza.

, do you go to the tailor shop a lot? It's great!There's something about seeing things up close, being able to feel the material yourself She's good at making me feel at ease trying on clothes, and I guess I kind of like being fussed over.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Ooh, a new home's going in there! Wonder what it might look like<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I can't wait to see, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I like that each exhibit here has its own unique vibe.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />I appreciate all the effort that goes into curating and displaying these exhibits behind the scenes.
Do you like watching the fish swim around at the museum as much as I do, ? When I'm there, I always make a point to look in on !
Aren't the bugs at the museum great?<10_4 /> I love losing myself in their world I could spend hours just watching !
Are you a fiend for fossils like me, ?Are you always hanging around the museum, mooning over too? I can't help being awed by things that are awesome, .
